Title: The Bronzebeard Legacy
Description:
Well, we did what we set out tae do... and more. We found Fearbreaker and did some good with it.

Now it's time tae bring it back tae Magni.

Let's hope Berrund learned a lesson here, but I suspect he'll manage tae get himself in trouble again soon. Hopefully, it'll be fer the right reasons an' with the right support.
RewardText:
It's funny. I can see why me Da' was so fond o' this hammer. And what it meant when he trusted others tae hold onto it.

Fearbreaker's got a mind of its own, in ways. It wants what it wants. 

I suppose I relate.
